pageTitle: Has your doctor said you might have less than 6 months to live due to any of your conditions?

severeCondition.label: Has your doctor said you might have less than 6 months to live due to any of your conditions?
severeCondition.hint:
This could also be a consultant or a specialist nurse.

You may get benefits at a higher rate and start getting payments quicker than usual. This is sometimes called ‘special rules’.

errors.required: Select yes if your doctor said you might have less than 6 months to live due to any of your conditions
